T09hjatm_iu:2998: vidadhatam iva lekhāṃ pāṇḍarāṃ vigraheṇa HJm_1.16b
T09hjatm_iu:3005: vidyādharādhipatitāṃ na ca nāpi rājyam HJm_3.32b
T09hjatm_iu:3017: vinādya kas tvāṃ śuka pāṭhayiṣyati HJm_8.38d
T09hjatm_iu:3036: vibhidya kasmān na gato 'si nirvṛtiṃ HJm_22.62c
T09hjatm_iu:3040: vimuñca he caṇḍi ruṣaṃ mahīyasīm HJm_8.34a
T09hjatm_iu:3059: vilokya gṛdhrair imam ittham ātmajaṃ HJm_7.38a
T09hjatm_iu:3062: vilokya śāvān atha tān kapotikā HJm_26.16a
T09hjatm_iu:3114: vṛkṣaṃ phalārtham abhiruhya nu kiṃ niviṣṭau HJm_32.30b
T09hjatm_iu:3123: vairāgyavastuni vṛthā khalu rāgam eti HJm_7.29d
T09hjatm_iu:3135: vyavasāye hi sati kriyāḥ phalanti HJm_12.17d
T09hjatm_iu:3138: vyasanaṃ na yāvad upayāti janaḥ HJm_12.33b
T09hjatm_iu:3146: vyālena kenacid utātra vipāditau tau HJm_32.30d
T09hjatm_iu:3149: vraja gṛhāya punaḥ kim ihāsyate HJm_35.16b
T09hjatm_iu:3153: vrīḍāvān abhavad adhomukhaḥ sa yantā HJm_1.8b
T09hjatm_iu:3154: śakalī ka enam udakāt samuddharet HJm_4.25b
T09hjatm_iu:3160: śaṅke codayatīti puṣpadhanuṣaṃ tāradhvaniḥ kokilaḥ HJm_35.19d
T09hjatm_iu:3180: śamāya yo na tvarate pramādabhāg niyojanīyo 'naḍuhām asau dhuri HJm_3.49/b
T09hjatm_iu:3188: śarāvaḥ kumbho vā na hi bhavati satyām api mṛdi HJm_20.21d
T09hjatm_iu:3193: śarīraṃ randhrekṣī pratidinam anaṅgaḥ kraśayati HJm_12.65d
T09hjatm_iu:3199: śareṇa viddhaṃ vyajati sma mārutaḥ HJm_19.31d
T09hjatm_iu:3201: śarvaryām athavāham eva cakitaṃ gacchāmi supte jane HJm_12.66b
T09hjatm_iu:3202: śalabhaṃ dīptir iva sphurantam agnau HJm_32.64d
T09hjatm_iu:3204: śaśajātir aho kveyaṃ kvedaṃ vāksauṣṭhavaṃ kva ca śamo 'yam HJm_4.6/a
T09hjatm_iu:3216: śāntajvālākalāpaḥ sa ca vanadahanas tasya puṇyānubhāvāt HJm_4.32c
T09hjatm_iu:3220: śāntendriyo jigamiṣuḥ sa munir vanāntam HJm_26.18b
T09hjatm_iu:3239: śikhini gurukalāpe dṛṣṭayas tatra petuḥ HJm_12.39b
T09hjatm_iu:3250: śirāṃsi dattāni mayā ca yasmin HJm_5.29b
T09hjatm_iu:3252: śiro yadi cchetsyati bhūpater bhavān HJm_5.26b
T09hjatm_iu:3259: śīlaṃ paripālayatā trātāḥ sattvā mayūrabhūtena HJm_12.1/a
T09hjatm_iu:3260: śīlaṃ viśuddham upagṛhya vased vanānte HJm_35.31d
T09hjatm_iu:3277: śuśrāva duḥkham iti naiva janaḥ kadācit HJm_6.39d
T09hjatm_iu:3279: śuśrāva yācakajanasya na jātu loko HJm_8.5c
T09hjatm_iu:3291: śyenaiḥ so 'yam adhomukhaiḥ kṣitipatir bhrāmyadbhir ālokyate HJm_5.36d
T09hjatm_iu:3298: śrīgarbhaḥ kriyate kalaṅkaparuṣād ghaṇṭīkṛtān nāyasaḥ HJm_11.44d
T09hjatm_iu:3308: śrutvā yāsyati sāśru locanayugaṃ prītyā śriyaṃ kām api HJm_3.11b
T09hjatm_iu:3309: śrutvā vacas tasya sa bhūmipālo HJm_20.24a
T09hjatm_iu:3312: śrūyante na kalāpināṃ giriguhāsaṃsargadīrghā giraḥ HJm_4.8b
T09hjatm_iu:3321: śroṣyāmīti subhāṣitāni bhavato jātaṃ mukhaṃ sasmitaṃ HJm_3.11a
T09hjatm_iu:3332: sa eva meghatvam upaiti saṃcitaḥ HJm_1.44d
T09hjatm_iu:3333: sa eva śokād iva hā bhaviṣyati HJm_8.37c
T09hjatm_iu:3359: sati tasmin praśamaḥ kuto bhavet HJm_26.2b
T09hjatm_iu:3360: sati prabodhe kim iva prabodhyate HJm_3.45d
T09hjatm_iu:3373: sa devatāṃ tāṃ rudatīm apaśyat HJm_22.55d
T09hjatm_iu:3376: sanāthatāṃ sādhu jagad gataṃ tvayā HJm_35.64a
T09hjatm_iu:3378: sa niyantā na śaśāka taṃ niroddhum HJm_1.18b
T09hjatm_iu:3390: sa brāhmaṇaś cainam apṛcchad evaṃ HJm_24.6a
T09hjatm_iu:3409: sa mātulo me bhagavān iti vyathāṃ HJm_22.60c
T09hjatm_iu:3412: samā bhavet kena punaḥ sahopamā HJm_32.66d
T09hjatm_iu:3437: sa mṛdugatir apaśyad dantinīṃ dantirājaḥ HJm_1.14c
T09hjatm_iu:3438: sametya covāca sa mānuṣīṃ giraṃ HJm_2.27a
T09hjatm_iu:3439: sametya yan nāma paro vinaśyati HJm_12.34b
T09hjatm_iu:3443: sa yūthabhartā pibataḥ śanair madaṃ HJm_19.5c
T09hjatm_iu:3445: sa rakṣitā yo vyasane 'pi rakṣati HJm_22.5d
T09hjatm_iu:3449: sa rujam agaṇayitvā prītim evālalambe HJm_22.14d
T09hjatm_iu:3459: sarvaṃ vastu nisargabhaṅguram iti dhyātveva śokāc ciraṃ HJm_4.8c
T09hjatm_iu:3484: sahasā taḍid ātmānaṃ darśayati naṭīva savilāsam HJm_12.14/b
T09hjatm_iu:3487: saṃkalpād viṣayābhilāṣiṇi jane tṛṣṇā karoty āspadaṃ HJm_20.63a
T09hjatm_iu:3494: saṃcintyeti paropakāravimukhī puṃsā na k' matiḥ HJm_8.21d
T09hjatm_iu:3498: saṃtāpād aratiḥ smṛteḥ pramathanī smṛtyā vinā hrīḥ kutaḥ HJm_12.67b
T09hjatm_iu:3514: saṃsāre bhramato mahāndhatamase saṃtiṣṭhamānasya vā HJm_11.41a
T09hjatm_iu:3528: sādhoḥ sādhuphale nitāntamahatī dve eva te māṃ prati HJm_11.41b
T09hjatm_iu:3530: sādhvīnām avagantṛbhir bhavabhidāṃ tāthāgatīnāṃ girāṃ HJm_32.57c
T09hjatm_iu:3532: sāntvenainam upāyapūrvakam ahaṃ neṣyāmi dharmyāṃ sthitim HJm_32.33d
T09hjatm_iu:3534: sāptapadīnaṃ sakhyaṃ bhavati satāṃ prakṛtiśuddhacittānām HJm_4.4/a
T09hjatm_iu:3537: sā yatra dṛṣṭam ahani dviradena tena HJm_19.9a
T09hjatm_iu:3539: sārthaṃ na taskaragaṇo 'pi mumoṣa tasya HJm_2.9d
T09hjatm_iu:3550: siṃhaṃ sthitā nabhasi tuṣṭuvire ca siddhāḥ HJm_32.48d
T09hjatm_iu:3551: siṃhān nānyo māṃsabhuk kaścid asti HJm_32.40a
T09hjatm_iu:3571: sukhinas ta eva sudhiyas ta eva ca HJm_20.13b
T09hjatm_iu:3582: sutam iva taṃ parisāntvayan bhayārtam HJm_19.23d
T09hjatm_iu:3597: sumanāḥ ko na bhaved guṇānurāgī HJm_1.47b
T09hjatm_iu:3605: suṣvāpa tau sa parirabhya sukhaṃ niśāyām HJm_32.85d
T09hjatm_iu:3609: sūkṣme vastuni tasya śāstraviṣaye vyarthaṃ matiḥ khidyate HJm_32.59b
T09hjatm_iu:3613: sevārtaḥ param ārirādhayiṣayā nighno bhavaty andhavan HJm_20.63c
T09hjatm_iu:3615: saiṃhīṃ kaṣṭāṃ yonim apy āśrito 'haṃ HJm_32.40c
T09hjatm_iu:3617: soḍhuṃ śakṣyati tāṃ kathaṃ nu narake prādurbhavadvepathuḥ HJm_12.68d
T09hjatm_iu:3630: skandhaṃ sa tasya vihagaḥ sahasādhiruhya HJm_7.32a
T09hjatm_iu:3633: skandhān mahāntam avatārya sa mūlabhāram HJm_24.4b
T09hjatm_iu:3635: skhalati niyatam ajñaḥ snehapāśān amuktvā HJm_4.21b
T09hjatm_iu:3644: stimitam udadheḥ kṣubhṇāty ambhaḥ patatripatiḥ patañ HJm_32.94a
T09hjatm_iu:3646: stutau nindāyāṃ vā mahati vibhave vā vipadi vā HJm_32.46b
T09hjatm_iu:3649: strītvaṃ kvedaṃ buddhir eṣā kva tīkṣṇā HJm_6.28a
T09hjatm_iu:3650: strītve 'pi bodhisattvaś chittvā māṃsaṃ dadau nijād dehāt HJm_6.1/a
T09hjatm_iu:3659: sthitaḥ sa prājñānām upari saviteva dyutimatām HJm_32.46d
T09hjatm_iu:3672: snigdho jano na khalu cintayati svapīḍām HJm_12.19d
T09hjatm_iu:3674: snehena tau rasanayā muhur ālileha HJm_32.84d
T09hjatm_iu:3679: spṛśanty adhikṣepaśarāś ca yan manas HJm_12.23c
T09hjatm_iu:3699: smitena ye kiṃ cid udīritatviṣo HJm_7.24a
T09hjatm_iu:3701: syātām ādhimatoḥ kadā nu sukhinī strīpuṃsayoś cetasī HJm_12.67d
T09hjatm_iu:3702: syātām imāṃ kim atha vādriguhāṃ praviṣṭau HJm_32.30c
T09hjatm_iu:3716: svapne kilādya puram etad aśeṣam antrair HJm_20.22a
T09hjatm_iu:3721: svayaṃ gato 'sāv iti bhūpatir divam HJm_8.32b
T09hjatm_iu:3733: svāyaṃbhuvīṃ gatim agāt svatanuṃ vihāya HJm_5.23d
T09hjatm_iu:3738: harati tṛṣaṃ vada sāgareṇa ko 'rthaḥ HJm_5.12d
T09hjatm_iu:3746: hariṇāṃs tān punar ekatām upetān HJm_11.8d
T09hjatm_iu:3768: hiṃsro 'pi krūrabhāvāt ka iva na viramed durgatiprāptihetoḥ HJm_32.44d
